Index.title: Menghubungkan ide-ide kamu, satu koneksi pada satu waktu.
Index.subtitle: Dari rumah hingga kantor pusat, <ideanet>IDEANET</ideanet> mengembangkan transformasi digital di Indonesia melalui infrastruktur ICT yang netral dan solusi yang inovatif.
Index.segmented_title: Choose the right digital tools to thrive, whether you're a personal or a tech-powered enterprise.
Index.segmented_retail_desc: Elevate your everyday. Experience seamless internet, captivating TV, and clear phone calls with Ideanet personal solutions.
Index.segmented_enterprise_desc: In today's fast-paced world, your IT infrastructure needs to be agile and secure. Ideanet enterprise solutions provide the foundation for success.
Index.why_subtitle: IdeaNet isn't just internet, it's a commitment to enriching your digital life. Choose IdeaNet and experience the difference.
Index.why_1_desc: Affordable maintenance keeps your budget balanced, freeing up resources for growth.
Index.why_2_desc: Our solutions streamline operations, helping you work smarter and achieve more.
Index.why_3_desc: Flexible, scalable technology enhances security and protects your valuable data.
Index.why_4_desc: We handle IT headaches, so you can focus on what you do best â€“ run and grow your enterprise.
Index.why_5_desc: 24/7 customer support ensures you're always connected and never left in the dark.
Index.why_6_desc: Blazing-fast internet puts you ahead of the game and streamlines every digital task.
Index.why_7_desc: Our seasoned team brings experience and expertise to guide you every step of the way.
Index.product_title: No boundaries, endless possibilities. Explore the Ideanet cutting-edge solutions.
Index.product_1_point1: 1. Home or office, From casual browsing to powering business empires, our internet plans ignite your digital world.
Index.product_1_point2: 2. Reliability, Stay connected and productive, backed by our robust network and dedicated support.
Index.product_1_point3: 3. Simple and secure, Enjoy effortless setup, intuitive tools, and advanced security features for peace of mind.
Index.product_1_point4: 4. Scalability, Grow your connection as you grow, with flexible plans that adapt to your ever-changing needs.
Index.product_2_point1: 1. Smart Parking, Optimize parking management with real-time data insights, automated guidance, and seamless payment integrations.
Index.product_2_point2: 2. Smart Cluster, Build secure and scalable computing clusters for high-performance applications like data analytics, and scientific research.
Index.product_2_point3: 3. Smart Healthcare, Revolutionize healthcare delivery with connected devices, remote monitoring, and advanced data analysis tools.
Index.product_3_point1: 1. Easy Deployment, Get up and running quickly with minimal disruption to your business.
Index.product_3_point2: 2. 24/7 Support, Our team is here to support you, ensuring your network runs smoothly around the clock.
Index.product_3_point3: 3. Customizable Options, Tailor your SD-WAN solution to fit your specific needs and objectives.
Index.client: A diverse range of partners, From individual to enterprise, we empower companies across every field.
Index.closing_statement: Ready to experience the future of connection?
